column1: Little Goat Diner////Stephanie Izard's a force in the Chicago culinary scene. Sure
column2: she's the first female chef to win Top Chef. But more importantly
column3: she's staked her culinary claim in the West Loop area of Chicago
column4: which is certainly a dining hot spot. Chef Izard's got Girl and the Goat & Little Goat Diner amidst bastions such as Aviary & Next as well as Publican & Blackbird. And something's clearly going right in her kitchen
column5: because both of her locations are regularly packed.
